column5: Guest bedroom and bathroom. Pillow-top mattress with 8 different pillows, smart TV with access to Netflix, Hulu, AmazonPrime TV, Pandora, Spotify. Large closet space and dresser drawer space, blackout curtains for light sleepers. Air conditioned and has ceiling fan. Bathroom very close just down the hall. Quiet & safe neighborhood. Feel free to park on the right side of driveway or on the street.
